attributes.contentHtml: IF YOU ARE GONNA UPLOAD A IMAGE, USE THE FUCKING UPLOADING TOOL, IT'S THERE FOR A REASON, IT IS A LOT SIMPLER THEN GOING TO A WEBSITE, UPLOADING THE IMAGE & GETTING THE LINK TO IT, PLUS YOU SAVE THE ADMINS A LOT MORE TIME, BECAUSE THEY HAVE TO UPLOAD THE IMAGES FROM THE LINKS!

FireShooter well we dont upload it to website. We use tool called "sharex" and it has autoupload feature and sharex does save more time cus

  1. You just use shortcut
  2. It has automatic copy feature so after u take screenshot it will automatically copy to your clipboard so its quicker
    Sharex is a lot faster and it has a lot features
